conversation.message: That is a crucial question, Parent_B, and we are proud of our specialized approach. For early literacy, we utilize a phonics-based program integrated with story-telling and hands-on activities, ensuring children understand sound-letter correspondence while developing a love for reading. For numerical skills, we employ manipulatives (like counting bears and blocks) and real-world problem-solving scenarios, moving beyond rote memorization to instill true number sense, pattern recognition, and basic arithmetic concepts. We track progress closely to ensure every child meets developmental milestones. We truly believe this comprehensive approach would benefit your child greatly.
